item.title: How to Get Promoted When Your Team is Remote
item.description:
Description

How do you get ahead when everyone is apart? In today's talk, we'll discuss how to set yourself up for success in today's remote world - whether your goal is to score a raise, get a promotion or move onto a new team. And please - bring your questions - we'll have lots of time for you to ask what's on your mind.

#PWC2022 attracted nearly 375 attendees from 36 countries and 21 time zones making it the biggest and best year yet. The highly engaging format featured 90 speakers, 6 tracks (including 80 talks and 4 tutorials) and took place virtually on March 21-25, 2022 on LoudSwarm by Six Feet Up.

More information about the conference can be found at: https://2022.pythonwebconf.com
item.dc:creator: Debbie Madden
